file_content.text: What you have done here today.... You defile our most sacred place. This is no act of war. It's an atrocity.
Go ahead. Finish it. I do not fear death....
Um, pardon the intrusion. I thought you'd want to know, the Jedi Temple is now fully under our control.
We have a number of Jedi Padawans in our custody. Must be recent additions; they didn't know the first thing about fighting. What would you have me do with them?
We should send a clear message. Litter the Temple courtyard with their bodies.
Kill them.
They're not worth the time to kill. Send them out. Let them spread word of the Empire's victory.
They're trivial. Release them.
What do we do with little fish? Catch and release. Let them tell everyone what we did here today.
Let 'em go.
No! Monster!
Well?
Straight away, sir!
Straight away, my lord!
As you wish, my lord.
As you wish, sir.
So there may be a shred of decency in there after all....
You haven't found it yet, Lord Goh, because the blasted Jedi don't want it found! Keep searching.
When you sent me, you had to know the operation would be a success.
Naturally.
Don't I get to hear what Darth Arkous and his pet are discussing?
What is Lord Goh up to?
I don't care to stay here any longer than I have to. Are we done?
Can I go now?
You're welcome to do as you will. We would hope to speak with you again, but we aren't keeping you on a leash.
It's no secret. With the Temple secure, Lord Goh has been tasked with uncovering any hidden information stores.
The Temple and its mysteries are all ours now. Darth Arkous is indescribably pleased.
I did have a feeling....
If you won't go willingly, you leave me no choice!
Your presence here disgusts me!
You should never have come to Tython!
This is a sacred place!
A Jedi Knight fears no challenge!
You'll be punished for your crimes!
I will not tolerate this incursion!
The Force grants me strength!
I'm done holding back!
How desperate of the Empire to send you here!
The Empire's audacity is its downfall!
Imperial dogs!
Prepare to face judgment!
You could use a few lessons!
There is... no death....
On behalf of Darth Arkous, I thank you. This is a banner day for the Empire. Be proud.
Can you believe tech ops already remapped the secure comms? Talented slicers we have in our employ, though even they pale in comparison next to you.
